cz.opendata.tenderstats

Class Geocoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.opendata.tenderstats.Geocoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Geocoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Thread-safe geocoding of addresses to geographic coordinates.
    Author:
    Matej Snoha
    See Also:
    loadPositionCache(String), savePositionCache(String), Serialized Form

      Provider of geocoding services.
      static class  Geocoder.GeoProviderFactory
      Factory for creating GeoProviders from online HTTP services with supported output formats.
      class  Geocoder.Position
      Geographic position in latitude / longitude format.

      • locate

        public static Geocoder.Position locate(java.lang.String address)
        Converts address to its (approximate) location using default provider.
        Parameters:
        address - Address to locate, i.e. "Pátkova 3, Praha, Czech Republic"
        Returns:
        Resulting Position object. Returns null when lookup failed.

      • locate

        public static Geocoder.Position locate(java.lang.String address,
                       Geocoder.GeoProvider provider)
        Converts address to its (approximate) location using specified provider.
        Parameters:
        address - Address to locate, i.e. "Pátkova 3, Praha, Czech Republic"
        provider - Specified Geocoding provider.
        Returns:
        Resulting Position object. Returns null when lookup failed.

      • locate

        public static Geocoder.Position locate(java.lang.String address,
                       Geocoder.GeoProvider provider,
                       boolean useCache)
        Converts address to its (approximate) location using specified provider.
        Parameters:
        address - Address to locate, i.e. "Pátkova 3, Praha, Czech Republic"
        provider - Specified Geocoding provider.
        useCache - Whether to use cached results. If set to false, cached values will be ignored. Upon successful lookup, cached position will be overwriten with new.
        Returns:
        Resulting Position object. Returns null when lookup failed.

      • locate

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Geocoder.Position> locate(java.util.List<java.lang.String> addresses,
                                                       Geocoder.GeoProvider provider,
                                                       boolean useCache,
                                                       int maxConsecutiveFailures)
        Converts all adresses in in input set to their position using specified geocoding provider.
        Parameters:
        addresses - List of addresses to process
        provider - Geocoding Provider
        useCache - Whether to use cached results. If set to false, cached values will be ignored. Upon successful lookup, cached position will be overwriten with new.
        maxConsecutiveFailures - If 'maxConsecutiveFailures' consecutive lookups fail, operation will be cancelled and the intermediate results will be returned.
        Returns:
        Resulting address --> position Map. Contains no entries for failed lookups.
